item.title: Aston_martin
item.description: Source: Autocarmalaysia.com Aston Martin My first contact with Aston Martin was as an intern at the merchandise department. Under CEO Dr.Â Andy Palmer, the company wanted to diversify their brand, to go from an automotive brand to a global luxury brand. When I came into the company the merchandise was being developed. I got the opportunity to develop the data infrastructure. Collecting, analysing and reporting of saels data was a big part of my internship.

item.title: IVA_Driebergen
item.description: Soruce: www.ivadriebergen.nl Automotive Business Management undergraduate. For my undergraduate I chose to do automotive business management at the IVA Driebergen in The Netherlands. The automotive focus, wide subject range and social skill development were the main reasons I went to this Business School. During my studies here I have been a treasurer at the student association, student ambassador and have volunteered to represent companies on fairs as sales representative.

item.title: LBS
item.description: source: www.london.edu My LBS adventure This page will feature some of my most memorable experiences at LBS reading for the Masters in anaytics and management.
